intro: Scaphyglottis pumila, commonly known as the small-flowered scaphyglottis, is a herbaceous perennial native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family, and is characterized by its delicate, often fragrant flowers.
